titleStmt.title: I will pray with the spirit, and I will pray with the understanding also, or, A discourse touching prayer, from I Cor. 14.15 wherein is briefly discovered 1. What prayer is, 2. What it is to pray with the spirit, 3. What it is to pray with the spirit and with the understanding also / by John Bunyan.
titleStmt.author: Bunyan, John, 1628-1688.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: pages torn and tightly bound, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
